sentences.sContent: Gates and company were defiant, to the point of stonewalling regulators and refusing to take the charges seriously.
sentences.sContent_eng: Gates and company were defiant, to the point of stonewalling regulators and refusing to take the charges seriously.
sentences.sCn: 盖茨和公司目中无人，到了阻碍监管机构并且拒绝认真对待指控的地步。

words.tran: 妨碍；阻碍；小心翼翼地打球
